1.0.name: wordpress/genieknows-media
1.0.description:
With the newly-released GenieKnows Media WordPress plugin, WordPress publishers now have the ability to quickly and easily integrate GenieKnows Media's CPM display banners into their web pages and blogs. Turn your existing traffic into cash by including our branded advertisers in a variety of banners, sized to meet IAB specifications. Become part of one of the fastest growing display ad networks today.

Banner advertisements may be included...

  • As a sidebar widget.
  • Within a blog post or page, with the click of a button.
  • Anywhere in your template, using a simple PHP tag.
